1567730.name: Trainz 2019 DLC - Leadville Subdivision
1567730.description:
Leadville Sub Division 2.0 available!

Leadville Sub is a connection line between the BNSF Railway and the UP Railroad. While the sub is owned by BNSF, UP trains have trackage rights to the yard located in Leadville. BNSF also has trackage rights for Port Eagle to pickup and drop off intermodal trains at the yard. Beyond the yard at Port Eagle is serviced by UP.

Between Leadville and Dayton, a second track has been laid down to handle the increase traffic going to and from Orient. Plans to double track the remaining line hasn’t been planned out but if traffic demands picks up the idea might be brought back up. Only time will tell.
1567730.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 简体中文
